name: Core CI

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main ]

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3
      - name: Build Docker image
        run: docker build . --file Dockerfile --tag rpi-core:test
      - name: Run container tests
        run: |
          docker run --rm rpi-core:test python3 -c "print('OK')"
